song.title: Don't slam the door
song.info:
Don't slam the door ===================
Written by Gargoyle July 11th/12th 1998
I don't know, it seems to me that I've heard this melody before... or something similar... But I think the title fits well.
Greetings to ------------ Zaba, Scirocco, GDJ, my friends in Germany and Argentina, Phantasma, Jeffrey Lim, and to Necros and Lizardking because I've ripped their samples.
Visit my spot on the web:
http://www.geocities.com/SunsetStrip/Stadium/1822
